statements: SELECT * FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords;
SELECT aircraft_id, maintenance_date, description FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type='Routine';
SELECT description, maintenance_type FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE aircraft_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT aircraft_id, recorded_by_user FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE description LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT * FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE aircraft_id = 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, description, maintenance_type FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY aircraft_id ASC, maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT description, maintenance_type, recorded_by_user FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' AND recorded_by_user = 'John Doe' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT aircraft_id, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM AircraftMaintenanceRecords GROUP BY aircraft_id HAVING maintenance_count > 5 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC, aircraft_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, last_maintenance_date FROM Aircraft;
SELECT registration_number, manufacturer, last_maintenance_date FROM Aircraft;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord;
SELECT record_id, registration_number, maintenance_date, description FROM MaintenanceRecord;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM Aircraft ORDER BY registration_number DESC;
SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM Aircraft WHERE manufacturer = 'Boeing';

SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM Aircraft JOIN MaintenanceRecord ON Aircraft.registration_number = MaintenanceRecord.registration_number WHERE MaintenanceRecord.maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT Aircraft.registration_number, Aircraft.aircraft_type, COUNT(MaintenanceRecord.record_id) AS total_maintenance_records FROM Aircraft LEFT JOIN MaintenanceRecord ON Aircraft.registration_number = MaintenanceRecord.registration_number GROUP BY Aircraft.registration_number ORDER BY total_maintenance_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_type FROM Aircraft ORDER BY aircraft_type ASC;
SELECT registration_number, manufacturer FROM Aircraft WHERE aircraft_type='Boeing';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name FROM SafetyRegulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft WHERE aircraft_type = 'Boeing 737';
SELECT aircraft_id, manufacturer FROM Aircraft WHERE registration_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT AVG(aircraft_id) AS avg_id FROM Aircraft;
SELECT r.regulation_name, m.maintenance_date FROM SafetyRegulations r JOIN MaintenanceRecords m ON r.regulation_id = m.record_id;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft ORDER BY aircraft_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT aircraft_id, aircraft_type, manufacturer FROM Aircraft;
SELECT registration_number, aircraft_type, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM Aircraft;
SELECT maintenance_id, aircraft_id, maintenance_date, description, engineer_name FROM MaintenanceRecords;
SELECT engineer_id, engineer_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM Engineers;
SELECT * FROM Aircraft;
SELECT manufacturer, aircraft_type FROM Aircraft;
SELECT registration_number, manufacturer, year_of_manufacture FROM Aircraft ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC;
SELECT m.maintenance_id, m.maintenance_date, m.description, e.engineer_name FROM MaintenanceRecords m JOIN Engineers e ON m.engineer_name = e.engineer_name;
SELECT r.regulation_name, r.description, e.engineer_name FROM Regulations r JOIN Engineers e ON r.regulation_id = e.engineer_id;
SELECT * FROM aircraft;
SELECT manufacturer, model FROM aircraft WHERE aircraft_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE aircraft_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_record WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' LIMIT 3;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM maintenance_event ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM aircraft ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, model DESC
SELECT registration_number, manufacturer FROM aircraft WHERE manufacturer='Boeing' OR manufacturer='Airbus'
SELECT MAX(aircraft_id) AS max_id FROM aircraft
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM maintenance_record
SELECT aircraft_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM maintenance_record JOIN maintenance_event ON maintenance_record.record_id = maintenance_event.record_id GROUP BY aircraft_id HAVING total_events > 5
